body_html:
Hi @SsnL, sorry that I guess I deleted the data from the repo.
Here it is: de.sent.1e4.txt.
Feel free to also use other normal text file like text8.

I tried it on pytorch 0.4, and the same error occurs as well.

Thanks! :)

body:
Hi @SsnL, sorry that I guess I deleted the data from the repo.
Here it is: [de.sent.1e4.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/2082475/de.sent.1e4.txt).
Feel free to also use other normal text file like [text8](https://cs.fit.edu/~mmahoney/compression/textdata.html).

I tried it on pytorch 0.4, and the same error occurs as well.

Thanks! :)
